title: Mercury Transit in the 2nd House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Mercury’s transit through your second house sharpens focus on speech, values, and financial decisions. Communication becomes practical and results-oriented, especially around money, family matters, and daily resources. This phase favors budgeting, negotiations, and skill-based income, but careless words can affect relationships if spoken without thought.

sections.heading: Career
points: Good for salary talks and client discussions

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Words can heal or hurt—choose carefully

closing: This transit rewards mindful speech and calculated decisions, especially in matters of money and family values.
